name: ORD_BLOOD_SPEC_REQTS
description: Blood special requirements on Orders (ORD) records.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BLOOD_SPEC_REQTS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the list of special preparation requirements for a blood order.
